name: zkputer Verification Tools
description: Registers zkputer verification tools for OpenClaw agents.

mcpServerCommand.description: Command used to run zkputer MCP server.

mcpServerArgs.description: Arguments for the MCP server command.

cargoManifestPath.description: Path to Cargo.toml used in default command args when mcpServerArgs is omitted.

mcpServerEnv.description: Environment variables passed to the MCP server process.
